name: A MAZING TOWER
description:
Making for a maze design small event,
All materials are from itch.io and RPG Maker official website

Materials
Major parts, the closing credits include the full version

  • Time Fantasy 1st OCC Winner Pack
  • 8-Bit Perfect Collection
  • Heroic Asset Series Creature Pack
  • Lil' Dragon - Pixel Art Tileset
  • Heroic Asset Series Icon Pack
  • Pixel Art Infinite Runner Pack
  • Silver - Premiere pixel font for game

Special Thanks

All Participants in maze design event,
internal testing partners, Evenchuchu, Wei-Yi, and RU
